name: DEMON GIRLS
description:
DEMON GIRLS is an open source HELLTAKER demake, coded in C by Juice Lizard, for the french handheld console Gamebuino Meta. VanRipper did not work on it.

Brave the dangers of Hell to seduce a dozen cute horny girls. And get the best harem in the world of pixels. This looks like Sokoban but much hotter.

In this fangame, you will find two hidden songs and seven levels in Heaven that are not in the original HELLTAKER.

Gamebuino website: https://gamebuino.com/fr

Juice Lizard's games: https://github.com/JuiceLizard

Paintings and drawings: http://www.juicelizard.com/

Merchandising: https://juicelizard.myspreadshop.fr/

Contact: juice.lizard@hotmail.fr
